relation: A Dragon-type attack. It inflicts a set amount of damage, regardless of the target's type.
A Dragon-type attack. It always inflicts a set amount of damage.
Launches shock waves that always inflict 40 HP damage.
The foe is hit with a shock wave that always inflicts 40- HP damage.
Inflicts a set amount of damage on the target.
The foe is stricken by a shock wave. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.
This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.
pageTitle: Dragon Rage (move) - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Description Dragon Rage always inflicts exactly 40 damage if it hits. It has no secondary effects and does not take weaknesses or resistances into account; however, it does not ignore type immunity.
